title: [Ta'Illistim, Stearriza Var]
description: The pitched roof of a nearby cottage slopes gently towards its stonework support, the roof tiles carefully laid atop one another in neat rows.  A large bougainvillea, its slender boughs laden with deep pink blossoms, drapes itself gently over one end of the cottage.

The domed roof of a nearby house is a shiny sapphire blue, its tiles carefully laid against one another in neat rows.  A large cluster of climbing vines, laden with tightly closed white roses, drapes itself gently over one end of the building.

The domed roof of a nearby house is a shiny sapphire blue, its tiles carefully laid against one another in neat rows.  A large cluster of climbing vines, laden with blooming white roses, drapes itself gently over one end of the building.

The domed roof of a nearby house is a shiny sapphire blue, its tiles carefully laid against one another in neat rows.  A large cluster of climbing vines, laden with tightly closed white roses, drapes itself gently over one end of the building.  A cobblestone path leads east towards a large marble tower.
paths: Obvious paths: northeast, south, southwest, northwest
